name: Memento Mori (itch) (Nivavavava)
description:
The game is set in a distant future where machines have taken over and is ravaging the world. You play as a member of a resistance force tasked with delivering an EMP (Electro Magnetic Pulse) to the hivemind of the Machine army in order to shut it down. Along the way you have to option of augment your body to better fight the machines that are trying to stop you but, in the process, turning you more mechanical.

Made by a team of six:

Anette Paula Maria Essel (2D Artist), Mohamad Karam Hariri (Programmer), James Kerber (PM), Max Niva (2D Artist), Miguel Redondo (Programmer), Josefine Skeppström (Game Designer).
